author: alofty645
message: fix: removed punctuation from screen reader lesson (#63764)

@@ -45,31 +45,31 @@ Which of the following is the screen reader built into macOS and iOS devices?

-Ella.

 Think of the screen reader software Apple made and maintain.

@@ -81,31 +81,31 @@ Which of the following are screen readers not made for?
 
 ## --answers--
 
-The blind.
+The blind
 
 ### --feedback--
 
 Look out for those with disability not related to vision.
 
 ---
 
-Visually impaired people.
+Visually impaired people
 
 ### --feedback--
 
 Look out for those with disability not related to vision.
 
 ---
 
-The deaf.
+The deaf
 
 ---
 
-Dyslexic people.
+Dyslexic people
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-Look out for those with disability not related to vision.
+Look out for those with disability not related to vision

@@ -117,31 +117,31 @@ Which of these is not a feature of screen readers?
 
 ## --answers--
 
-Speech-to-text.
+Speech-to-text
 
 ---
 
-Text-to-speech.
+Text-to-speech
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-Think about what would not be useful to navigate a webpage without sight.
+Think about what would not be useful to navigate a webpage without sight
 
 ---
 
-Braille output.
+Braille output
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-Think about what would not be useful to navigate a webpage without sight.
+Think about what would not be useful to navigate a webpage without sight
 
 ---
 
-Web browsing support.
+Web browsing support
